GIT-REBASE(1)                     Git Manual                     GIT-REBASE(1)

NAME
       git-rebase - Reapply commits on top of another base tip

SYNOPSIS
       git rebase [-i | --interactive] [--onto <newbase>] [<upstream> [<branch>]]
       git rebase (--continue | --abort | --skip)

OPTIONS
       --continue
              Continue after conflict resolution.

       --abort
              Abort the rebase operation.

       --onto=<newbase>
              Rebase onto the specified base.

COMMANDS
       continue   Continue a stopped rebase
       abort      Abort the current rebase
